import React from 'react' import { Col, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Row } from 'react-bootstrap' import {Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Product from '../components/Product' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' const Productscreens = ({match}) => { const product=products.find(p=>p._id===match.params.id) console.log(product) return ( <> Go back

{Product.name}

 ) } export default Productscreens
